front.title: An Authorized IP Firewall Control Application

abstract.t: The Authorized Firewall Control Protocol provides an interface thatallows network entities to request firewall and NAT services andresources. It is an instance of a protocol that providesauthorizations and other security servcies, and interworks with othersuch instances. AFWC uses its authorization facilities to providenetwork administrators more control over network border admissionsdecisions than is provided by other firewall pinholing protocols.
